mapper.select: select sc.id, sc.second_category_name, sc.first_category_id, fc.first_category_name, pit.image from second_category_tb sc left join first_category_tb fc on sc.first_category_id = fc.id left join product_tb pt on pt.second_category_id = sc.id left join product_image_tb pit on pt.id = pit.product_id where pit.is_thumbnail = 0 group by second_category_name order by sc.id asc;
